title: Francisco Scaramanga

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, select a player, you will shoot one visitor to their home tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You cannot shoot other SPECTRE agents
Scheme:**Solex Agitated:**
Upon completion, all players will begin to speak anonymously at night, unable to reveal who they are. In addition, SPECTRE may hang one player per night twice. The vote MUST be unanimous.

desc:
Post 4180
*Come, come, Mr. Bond, you disappoint me. You get as much fulfillment out of killing as I do, so why don't you admit it?*
